Welcome to corona_python's documentation!
=========================================

This is the documentation for the unofficial Python Coronavirus stats API Wrapper

Indices and tables
==================

The GitHub repository can be found here: https://github.com/MakufonSkifto/corona-python

PyPI: https://pypi.org/project/corona-python/
